fpmExplorer:Page.title: Custom Action
fpmExplorer:Page.introduction: The Table building block enables you to define custom actions in a table.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Add Custom Actions
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: You can add custom actions to your table.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Add Custom Menu Actions
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: You can also add custom menu actions to your table.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Add Actions through Manifest
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: If you want to add custom actions to your object page table rendered through UI.Facet annotations, you can use the 'actions' property in the controlConfiguration section of the respective UI.LineItem.
